summary: In this context, 1,3-Benzothiazole is mentioned as a vulcanization additive in the production of crumb rubber material (CRM) derived from recycled tires. The process of creating CRM involves shredding tires and incorporating various chemical additives, including 1,3-Benzothiazole, to enhance the properties of the rubber. However, the context does not elaborate on the specific role or impact of 1,3-Benzothiazole within the overall production process or its potential environmental implications.
